tracks.text: Text appears over a mobile home. Goodbye Earl. Opening credits roll. Dennis Franz as "Earl", Jane Krakowski as "Wanda", Lauren Holly as "MaryAnn", Michael Delouise and Adrian Pasdar as "Cops", and introducing Evan Bernard as "Ezekiel Kincaid".
Polaroid photos of Wanda and Mary Ann posing, smoking outside Dorris Place School, being sent to the office, eating lollypops, and holding a flag on a school stage.
The Chicks stand outside the highschool as MaryAnn and Wanda run out.
They hug as a bus pulls up.
She sees a middle aged man sit in a car.
She gets in wearing a wedding dress. He wears a tuxedo print track suit and gives finger guns.
In a mobile home, Earl shakes Wanda. She falls back, and glasses appear over her eyes.
She walks into the office of Attorney at Large, Ezekiel Kincaid.
Earl tears our view like paper and shakes us.
MaryAnn runs into a hospital. Wanda's left eye is swollen, surrounded by purple and yellow bruising. A cut digs into her lip and eyebrow.
MaryAnn and Wanda lock pinky fingers.
The women smile. The chicks sing.
The patients and orderlies in the hospital dance.
Earl eats black eyed peas.
Wanda smiles, dabbing at her mouth, thick makeup covering her eyes.
MaryAnn peaks through a doorway and smiles
The chicks sing at Earl. He falls sideways to the floor.
Wanda covers our view with a blue tarp.
A police car sits in front of the mobile home.
The cops look between figurines, under wall paintings, and under a chair. They bump into each other.
The women smile and wave.
A kid drinks from a milk carton with a message, Missing, Earl. The kid throws down the carton and stomps Earl's face.
The chicks slap their hips.
Chick Martie Maguire wears a skull and cross bones white tank top.
A crowd of people dance in front of a vegetable stand, including the chicks, the girls, and zombie Earl.
The chicks and girls look at a blue tarp in a trunk.
The 5 dance around Zombie Earl.
At night, MaryAnn and Wanda drag a blue tarp to a lake, while the Chicks sit on a car roof and sing.
The girls swing the tarp wrapped body into a ravine. It bounces against trees and rolls.
They wave goodbye.
The girls and chicks dance in a large circle in front of the vegetable stand.
Everyone stops, smiles, and poses.
They leap, arms in the air. Freeze frame. Cut to black.
